post.text: FBI Director Comey owes the American people an explanation. Five things you need to know:

comment.author: Karen
comment.text: Americans, why don't you vote in your orange clown. The rest of the world just hope and pray you will impeach Trump before he takes another of his hissy fits and pushes the button to blow up the world. And you wonder why we are concerned with how you vote!!?!!

replies.author: Georgia
replies.text: Why don't you ask Hillary to do this: HEY HILLARY, YOU CAN END ALL THIS GOSSIP BY SIMPLY RELEASING YOURS AND HUMAS EMAILS COMEYS IS SUPPOSED TO HAVE. SINCE YOU WANT PEOPLE TO SEE YOU AS BEING TRANSPARENT, I CHALLENGE YOU TODAY TO RELEASE ALL THOSE EMAILS AND HUMA TOO. COME ON, IF YOU HAVE NOTHING TO HIDE, THEN RELEASE THEM. SHOW YOUR SUPPORTERS TODAY YOU ARE TRANSPARENT. IF YOU DO NOT RESPOND THEY WILL KNOW YOU ARE LYING.

replies.author: Karen
replies.text: She is asking for a release from FBI according to the news! In the name of all that is decent....vote Hillary!

replies.author: Marcus
replies.text: It was not an embassy, it was a consulate, ! And the Republicans had withdrawn funding for protection

replies.author: Jessica
replies.text: Hillary is the one on tape saying Iran, Russia, and China better watch it if she is president, not Trump. Trump said he would not throw the first punch, but if he had to he would protect America. Hillary is the danger, in more ways than one.

replies.author: Karen
replies.text: Jessica Weaver we are not talking about punches here. We are talking about nuclear armament that has the potential to devastate the world. Hillary has already served on the world scene. She is known and respected by other countries including Canada around the world. Trump is a dictator and has shown that he will not be accountable to anyone except himself. He is neighter a Democrat or a Republican. He is vindictive and he looks out for himself. Can't you people see that?
